title: Mate2237
author: Mate2237
content: Dis questions been dey my mind since but I don't know how I wan place am for people to understand but today I say let me ask am make others tell us weti dem go do wen di time reach. Now di question be sae, we are all waiting for di "All Time High" of Bitcoin, now when di time come, you go "sell all your bitcoin or u go kep some"? Because of the ATH people dey buy dey kep while some dey save from their campaign pay so all di ones you dey save go end for the ATH? Then after that time, when the bear come again you go start afresh again? Or how u take plan the journey. As for me, I go sell 99% of my investment and hodle 1% to enter the bear market again and continue the investment from there again, I will not empty the bitcoin wallet Bank. How you see am?

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: This thing you talk now self na serious thin wey be say we don dey wait for to come but, as everi body dey panic about bullrun e go end after in run reach ATH because the majority of pipo wey dey here need money and them dey wait make the thin increase as e supposed be so that them fit make their gain and cash out hugely.On a normal stances we know say majority of people wey dey ginger for market to increase no get any other plans than just cash out when e enter better price then take small break watch the market again before them buy at very low price. Somebody like me never save from my current campaign but e get the one wey I used my money buy keep to waiting make the market show me love before I go push am out. So like this I dey wait make the market give us potential Green so that we go happy join.But anyhow everything dey your hands because you fit decides to sell when the time reach or keep am after the bull run but one thing I sense be say if you no sell the market go still drop and you go still regret why you no sell.

Almost everyone that invested in Bitcoin is not just waiting for its all time high, but also waiting for Bitcoin price to exceed the previous all time high so that the we will be satisfied future we are predicting in Bitcoin, with our predictions that Bitcoin price will go above its all time high during halving.QuoteAs for me, I go sell 99% of my investment and hodle 1% to enter the bear market again and continue the investment from there again, I will not empty the bitcoin wallet Bank. How you see am? There is no point of keep holding your Bitcoin if you really wants to take your profits during halving, although I will also sell mine but I will wait if the price go above its all time high, then wait for another opportunity to buy when the market go down again.I will also hold some Bitcoin for future purposes because no one can tell how it is going to be after then, who know maybe the price will just keep moving without going down again

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Well I think the vision for Bitcoin now is to pass the all time high and I think Bitcoin can actually do it, selling of at the current all time high fit be a mistakes as the Bitcoin halving na next year although this is not to say that it's a guarantee upward movement for Bitcoin but I am very optimistic. I believe that bitcoin can reach the all time high and surpass the current all time high by a good margin so it's important to understand the abilities of Bitcoin and try to work your plans for Bitcoin.

Then after that time, when the bear come again you go start afresh again? Or how u take plan the journey. The thing be say you get other investment wey you wan cashout from your Bitcoin bag take put for that business? If you no get and na Bitcoin be your investments there's no need selling as you fit sell at the wrong time. Or possibly no enter back the market at the right time. To eliminate all this stress to dey observe the market, you fit just sell wetin you go use hold body throughout the whole bear market and keep the rest for your wallet. You go just commot mind say you get Bitcoin until the next halving and bull run come. To sell all in hopes of buying them at cheaper price dey alright but you go fit follow through the idea and you no go chicken out because of fear say market fit fall again.Me I never sall Bitcoin say market dey go down, as I get am na so I get and anytime wey I need small change to use hold body, I go just rush go sell small use chop. I dun try this selling everything and waiting for the bear to come before I start the journey all over and e no favor me. As the money enta Naira na so I rush go use am buy something wey I dey regret somehow to this day. The investment no bad but it was at the wrong time because of to say I just leave all the money for Bitcoin, I for dun get better retuns pass the investing wey I do. If you know say you no go need cash urgently and the small small money wey you dey get here and there go dey enough for you, just forget am and lock up.

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: Personally I de like to chop remain, because evendo nobody fit to predict tomorrow, e must surely come. So for dis matter of bitcoin ATH, even if I de anticipate say di price go high well well and I go make huge profit, if I sell, that one no go make me to cashout my investment. Sofa bitcoin na investment wey I believe in, when di market reach all time high, I go decide the percentage wey I go sell, based on how I take need money at di time, but no matter how I need di money reach, I must remain something quite substantial for my going concern. Like for economics, bitcoin de oscillating, when market de favourable many people go de buy, but when di market begin to de experience loss, many people go de exit, at a time only di people wey withstand di loss go remain, eventually demand go de high again and dem go begin to gain more.Like di topic wey I start for bitcoin discuss board, e prove sa bitcoin no be gamble, https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5459424.msg62534957#msg62534957  . So far say you understand di volatility of bitcoin and you fit to understand di chart, no need to cashout, even if if you see plenty profit. Because after bear run, bull go follow. Na my opinion.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Em don tey my mind the ring for the ATH of bitcoin to happen. Since em go be my first halving/bull run wey I go witness and d fully prepared of. I no fit ascertain how em go be sha but looking at my bitcoin and altcoin holding d give me joy cos I no sae wetin d ahead during the bull run by next year give rise to a new ATH of bitcoin wey go surpass the previous one wey happen. When bitcoin give a new ATH of bitcoin, I no d sure sae I go keep small. I go sell 100% of my bitcoin and altcoin holding asap. Sae na because every 4years wey be bitcoin halving d happen and after that, the bitcoin price go skyrocket wey go give bitcoin ATH. The moment wey Bitcoin don reach em ATH for 2025 probably, what follows next go be bearish market. The crypto market is expected to turn red, making the price of bitcoin to fall drastically. My strategy go na be to enter the crypto market in the  bearish market to start to the accumulate bitcoin at low price, hodl am till another halving season wey give birth to another ATH of bitcoin wey you go na sell off. Em go be like a continuous process
